SELECT eva.id, eva.score, eva.content AS evaluationContent, eva.create_date AS evaluationDate, oi.`code`, oi.commodity_id AS commodityId, oi.price, oi.order_status AS orderStatus, oi.create_date AS createDate, ci.`code` AS commodityCode, ci.`name`, ci.type, ci.images, ci.content, ci.on_put AS onPut, si.introduction, si.tag, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, su.user_name AS shopName, su.avatar AS shopAvatar, ai.address, ai.`name` AS taskUserName, ai.phone FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.id = eva.order_id ) LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( ci.id = oi.commodity_id ) LEFT JOIN address_info ai ON ( ai.id = oi.address_id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info su ON ( su.id = si.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.userName},'%')
AND su.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.shopName},'%')
AND ci.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.commodityName},'%')
AND ci.type = #{evaluation.type}
ORDER BY eva.create_date

SELECT eva.id, eva.user_id AS userId, eva.score, eva.content, eva.create_date AS createDate, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = eva.user_id ) WHERE eva.order_id = #{ id }

SELECT eva.id, eva.user_id AS userId, eva.score, eva.content, eva.create_date AS createDate, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = eva.user_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON (oi.id = eva.order_id) WHERE oi.commodity_id = #{ id }
